Threat Intel - ViperSoftX RAT IOC
Date Added - 8/13/24

Summary: ViperSoftX typically arrives as a software crack, an activator or a patcher, or a key generator (keygen)

SOURCES:
1. https://www.trendmicro.com/content/dam/trendmicro/global/en/research/23/d/vipersoftx-updates-encryption-steals-data/IOCs_ViperSoftX-updates-encryption-steals-data.txt
2. https://www.trendmicro.com/en_ph/research/23/d/vipersoftx-updates-encryption-steals-data.html
